text: Raw Footage is the eighth studio album by American rapper, Ice Cube. Raw Footage was released on 19 August 2008 through Lench Mob Records. The album featured the singles "Gangsta Rap Made Me Do It" and "Do Ya Thang". The album debuted at #1 on both the Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums and the Top Rap Albums Charts. It also debuted at #5 on the Billboard 200. == Track listing == ;Notes * "What Is a Pyroclastic Flow?", "Hood Mentality", "Jack n the Box", "Get Used to It" and "Take Me Away" feature voice over by Keith David. * "Cold Places" is also featured on Ice Cube's greatest hits album The Essentials. ;Sample credits * "Hood Mentality" contains a sample of "Can I" performed by Eddie Kendricks. * "Thank God" contains a samples of "If We Don't Make It, Nobody Can" performed by Tom Brocker (written by Barry White, Bob Relf and Tom Brocker). * "Stand Tall" contains a sample of "Be Thankful for What You Got", written and performed by William DeVaughn. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2008 albums Category:Hip hop albums
title: Raw Footage
